content.prompt: In the third sentence of the first paragraph, the author mentions that war “has, through the centuries, been recognized by international law as a sovereign right” primarily to

choices.label: offer evidence in support of his ultimate conclusion
provide context his audience may lack
register a potential objection to a position he supports
challenge the factual basis for a view he opposes

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
